name: Hero Cats
summary:
恒星市里，一群超能猫咪的英雄故事。

Avengers and Justice League move over! 
The cutest heroes on the planet have arrived! 
Meet the Hero Cats of Stellar City in this spectacular first issue.
info:
• 中文名: 神勇猫咪
  • 别名: 神勇貓咪
  • 出版社: Action Lab Entertainment
  • 发售日: 2015-02-17
  • 作者: Kyle Puttkammer
  • 作画: Marcus Williams、Ryan Sellers
